text: This is a list of rivers in Bangladesh, by letter, with some Bangladeshi names given for some of the rivers; there are at least 31 known rivers of Bangladesh: * Arial Kha River * Atrai River * Bangali River (বাঙালি Bangali) * Baral River (বড়াল Bôṛal) * Biskhali River * Bhoirov River * Brahmaputra River (ব্রহ্মপুত্র Bromhoputro) * Buriganga River (বুড়িগঙ্গা Buṛigôngga) * Bura Gauranga River * Dhaleshwari River (ধলেশ্বরী Dhôleshshori) * Dhepa River * Feni River (ফেনী Feni) * Gorai-Madhumati River (গড়াই-মধুমতি Gôṛai-Modhumoti) * Gumti River * Haora River * Jaldhaka River (জলঢাকা Jôlḍhaka) * Jamuna River (যমুনা Jomuna) * Karnaphuli River (কর্ণফুলি Kôrnofuli) * Khowai River * Kushiyara River * Karotoa River * Mahananda River (মহানন্দা Môhanônda) * Manu River, Tripura * Meghna River (মেঘনা Meghna) * Muhuri River (মুহুরী Muhuri) * Naf River (নাফ Naf) * Padma River (পদ্মা Pôdda) * Punarbhaba River * Pusur River * Shitalakshya River (শীতালক্ষ্যা Shitalokkha) * Surma River (সুরমা Shurma) * Teesta River (তিস্তা Tista) * Bangladesh Bangladesh Category:Bay of Bengal
title: List of rivers of Bangladesh
